attributes.action: Allow taxpayers to claim allowances comparable to MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make a just and fair society for all, we ask that all UK taxpayers should be allowed to claim tax allowances equivalent to all of the things that MPs can claim for on their expenses i.e. cleaners, TVs, plumbing etc.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
